GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves article object matching article id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serve an array of all comment objects associated with an article_id

exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge
exampleResponse.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: should add a comment to an article associated with a given article_id

exampleResponse.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: should update an article's votes by article_id

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: should delete a comment with the given comment_id

GET /api/users.description: should return an array of users objects with expected keys

/api/articles?topic=:topic.description: should return an array of article objects filtered by topic when topic query is provided
